techmeme.title: Montréal-based Planned, which offers corporate events and travel planning tools, raised a CAD$35M Series B led by Drive Capital (Bianca Bharti/BetaKit)
Brazil-based Matera, which provides instant payment and QR code payment software to financial institutions, raised $100M from Warburg Pincus to expand in the US (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
Xbox says an outage is affecting the Xbox Store and subscriptions, and it is investigating the cause; the outage has been going on since at least 6:57PM ET (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Sources: Cellebrite gave the FBI unreleased tech to access the Trump shooter's phone, a "newer Samsung model", after the FBI's first attempt to crack it failed (Bloomberg)
Google says its goo.gl URL shortener links will stop working after August 25, 2025, after it stopped generating new goo.gl URLs in March 2019 (Abner Li/9to5Google)
